tutorial.title: Defining a Grid Item's Size
tutorial.descriptionContent: Make grid items expand across rows and columns to create unique layouts

lessons.title: Intro
lessons.interactiveContent: So far we've added grid items that span over one row or column. Let's learn how to create a grid item that spans multiple rows or columns.

lessons.title: Grid column property
lessons.interactiveContent:
The grid-column property is used to expand a grid item across multiple columns. Let's define this property for each grid item.

Make sure to pick grid-column, followed by grid-column.

lessons.title: Grid column value
lessons.interactiveContent:
We use the term span to talk about how much we expand a grid item. In code, span 2 means we span the grid item across two columns.

Make sure to type span 2.

lessons.title: Grid row property
lessons.interactiveContent:
If we want to set the size of a grid item across rows, we use the grid-row property. Let's define this property for the first grid item.

Make sure to pick grid-row.

lessons.title: Grid row value
lessons.interactiveContent:
Set the first grid item to span across three rows.

Make sure to type span 3.

lessons.title: Question: Grid column property
lessons.interactiveContent:
What happens when we use the grid-column property?

Grid items are spanned across grid columnsGrid items are spanned across grid rows

Grid items are spanned across grid columns.

lessons.title: Question: Grid column value
lessons.interactiveContent:
What does this CSS rule do?

It spans the grid items across 4 columnsIt spans the grid items across 4 rows

It spans the grid items across 4 columns.

lessons.title: Question: Grid row property
lessons.interactiveContent:
What happens when we use the grid-row property?

Grid items are spanned across grid rowsGrid items are spanned across grid columns

Grid items are spanned across grid rows.

lessons.title: Question: Grid row value
lessons.interactiveContent:
How many columns does grid-item span over?

23

Make sure to pick 2.

lessons.title: Example: Grid column property
lessons.interactiveContent:
Code the property that spans a grid item across grid columns.

Make sure to pick grid, followed by -, and finally column.

lessons.title: Example: Grid column value
lessons.interactiveContent:
Code the value so that the grid item spans across two columns.

Make sure to type 2.

lessons.title: Example: Grid row property
lessons.interactiveContent:
Code the property that spans a grid item across grid rows.

Make sure to type grid-row.

lessons.title: Example: Grid row value
lessons.interactiveContent:
Set grid-row to the value that spans a grid item across three rows.

Make sure to type span 3.
